Html: Hi, I need to be able to zoom in on a map futher than the zoom level available. As you know once you get to a certain zoom level say in Google Maps then there are no tiles available at that level. Is it possible to have the tiles that were available at the highest zoom level be stretched to effectivly zoom in on available tiles.For example this may mean that only one tile (or only part of it is shown)but it still fills the entire screen. Much like the way Google Earth does it. Thanks
yes that is in my plans, but i have no schedule ;} If you have time, you can help to make it faster, source is available
Thanks, has any work been done on it already? Any pointers on where to start looking to make changes?
all we need is just generation of pseudo tile for the larger zoom layer, i'm not sure where to start ;}
